mapper.select: SELECT PSID, PCID, PID, PMIMG1, BNAME, PNAME, OPENYN, REGYN FROM PRODUCT_DRAW WHERE REGYN = 'Y'
SELECT PSID, PCID, PID, PMIMG2, BNAME, PNAME, PMILEAGE, PSIZE, PCOLORCODE, PNOTE, OPENYN FROM PRODUCT_DRAW WHERE PSID = #{psid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERMANAGER.DRAWS(DID, PSID, PCID, PID, EMAIL, WDATE, PHONE ) VALUES(SEQ_DRAWS.NEXTVAL, #{psid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT PSID, PCID, PID, PMIMG1, BNAME, PNAME, OPENYN, REGYN FROM PRODUCT_DRAW

SELECT A.EMAIL, C.PNAME, A.PSID, A.PHONE, B.NAME, TO_CHAR(A.WDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WDATE, A.OSTATUS FROM USERMANAGER.DRAWS A INNER JOIN USERMANAGER.MEMBER B ON A.EMAIL = B.EMAIL INNER JOIN PRODUCTMANAGER.PRODUCT_DRAW C ON A.PSID = C.PSID
SELECT NAME, EMAIL, PHONE FROM USERMANAGER.MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
